CustomField.formula: YEAR(CMPL123CME__B3_Date_of_Event__c) - YEAR(CMPL123CME__A2_DOB__c) - IF( MONTH(CMPL123CME__B3_Date_of_Event__c) > MONTH(CMPL123CME__A2_DOB__c), 0 , IF( MONTH(CMPL123CME__B3_Date_of_Event__c) != MONTH(CMPL123CME__A2_DOB__c), 1 , IF( DAY(CMPL123CME__B3_Date_of_Event__c) >= DAY(CMPL123CME__A2_DOB__c), 0, 1 ) ) )
CustomField.label: A2 - Patient Years Old
